general.name: Alias eyeSessions
general.shortDesc: Allows to call a function of the eyeSessions library.

definition.desc: Allows to call a function of the eyeSessions library.

params.name: call
params.desc: Name of the function of the eyeSessions library to call.

params.name: args
params.desc: Array containing the arguments that will be passed to the function. Whether the arguments are expressed as an indexed or associative array depends on the own function's syntax.

definition.return: The value returned by the eyeSessions function.
